summary.span: 表示一个长方形的小弹出窗口，该窗口在用户将指针悬停在一个控件上时显示有关该控件用途的简短说明。

span.span: Represents a small rectangular pop-up window that displays a brief description of a control's purpose when the user rests the pointer on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类，可以在用户将指针放在控件上时向用户提供提示。With the class, you can provide hints to a user when the user places the pointer on a control. 类通常用于向用户通知控件的预期用途。The class is typically used to alert users to the intended use of a control. 例如，可以指定接受名称的控件的工具提示文本 ，并指定要键入到控件中的名称的格式。For example, you can specify ToolTip text for a control that accepts a name, specifying the format of the name to be typed into the control. 除了提供提示外，还可以使用 类来提供运行时状态信息。In addition to providing hints, you can also use the class to provide run time status information. 例如， 当用户将指针移到 显示 Internet 连接状态的控件上时，可以使用类来显示连接速度和行质量数据。For example, you can use the class to display connection speed and line quality data when the user moves the pointer onto a control that displays Internet connection status. 类可以在任何容器中使用。The class can be used in any container. 若要显式指定容器，请使用 构造函数。To explicitly specify a container, use the constructor. 单个 组件通常用于为单个窗体上的多个控件创建工具提示。A single component typically is used to create ToolTips for multiple controls on a single form. 创建后 ，使用单独的方法调用将 工具提示显示文本关联到单个控件。After you create a , use a separate call to the method to associate ToolTip display text to an individual control. 然后，当用户将指针移到控件上时，将显示带有其文本的工具提示。Then when the user moves the pointer on a control, the ToolTip with its text is displayed. 对于同一控件，可以多次调用， 以更改与该控件关联的文本。You can call more than once for the same control to change the text that is associated with the control. 若要获取与控件关联的文本，请使用 方法。To get the text that is associated with a control, use the method. 若要删除与类的实例关联的所有工具提示文本 ，请使用 方法。To remove all ToolTip text associations with an instance of the class, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 对于禁用的控件，不显示工具提示文本。ToolTip text is not displayed for controls that are disabled. 除非将 属性设置为 `true` ，否则在其容器处于非活动状态时，不会显示工具提示。Unless the property is set to `true`, ToolTips are not displayed when their container is inactive. 类提供以下属性和方法来修改工具提示的默认行为和外观。The class provides the following properties and methods to modify the default behavior and appearance of a ToolTip. |类别Category|关联成员Associated members| |--------------|------------------------| |手动显示Manual display|, , , , , , , , , , | |工具提示计时ToolTip timing|, , , , , , , , | |ContentContent|, , , , , , , , , , | |外观Appearance|, , , , , , , , , , | 如果要禁用所有 ToolTip 文本，使其无法在应用程序中显示，则可以使用 属性。If you want to disable all ToolTip text so that it cannot be displayed in your application, you can use the property. 通常，工具提示是由操作系统绘制的，但若要自定义的外观 ，可以将属性设置 为 `true` 并处理 事件。Usually the ToolTip is drawn by the operating system, but to customize the appearance of the , you can set the property to `true` and handle the event. 类实现 接口，该接口具有一个方法 。The class implements the interface, which has a single method, . 工具提示在设计时扩展相同窗体上的控件，添加 `ToolTip` 属性。ToolTips extend controls on the same form at design time, adding a `ToolTip` property. 有关扩展程序提供程序的详细信息，请参阅 [扩展程序提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171835(v=vs.120))。For more information about extender providers, see [Extender Providers](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171835(v=vs.120)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建类的一个实例 ，并将该实例与在其中创建该实例的关联 。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 然后，该代码初始化延迟属性 、 和 。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外，类的实例 将 属性设置为， `true` 以使 ToolTip 文本始终显示，而不管窗体是否处于活动状态。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to always be display regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件（和）相关联 。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 此代码示例要求在示例中定义的方法位于 包含 名为的控件 `button1` 和 名为的控件 `checkBox1` ，并且该方法是从的构造函数中调用的 。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1`, and that the method is called from the constructor of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性，您可以为具有此特定组件指定的文本的所有控件启用或禁用工具提示文本显示 。With the property, you can enable or disable the display of ToolTip text for all controls that have text specified by this particular component. 尽管 可创建多个组件并将其分配给一个窗体，但将 属性设置为 `false` 只会影响当前 。Although more than one component can be created and assigned to a form, setting the property to `false` only affects the current . 可以让用户以提供应用程序选项的形式设置此属性的值。You can enable users to set the value of this property in a form that provides application options. 这些选项进而使用户能够在应用程序中启用或禁用工具提示的显示。These options, in turn, provide the user with the ability to enable or disable the display of ToolTips in your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您可以设置一个延迟值，该值随后用于设置 、 和属性的值 。The property enables you to set a single delay value, which is then used to set the values of the , , and properties. 每次 设置此属性时，将默认设置以下值。Each time the property is set, the following values are set by default. |属性Property|默认值Default Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||属性值的10倍 。10 times the property value.| ||等于 属性值。Equal to the property value.| ||属性值为1/5。1/5 of the property value.| 设置属性后，也可以单独设置这些属性 。These properties can also be set independently once the property has been set. 有关详细信息，请参阅 、 和 属性。For more information, see the , , and properties. 此属性通常用于为工具提示窗口提供一致的延迟模式。This property is typically used to provide a consistent delay pattern for your ToolTip windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当指针位于控件上时，可以使用属性来缩短或延长窗口的显示时间。The property enables you to shorten or lengthen the time that the window is displayed when the pointer is on a control. 例如，如果在工具提示窗口中显示广泛的帮助，则可以增大此属性的值，以确保用户有足够的时间来读取文本。For example, if you display extensive Help in a ToolTip window, you can increase the value of this property to ensure that the user has sufficient time to read the text. 如果要为 "工具提示" 窗口设置一致的延迟模式，可以设置 属性。If you want to have a consistent delay pattern for your ToolTip windows, you can set the property. 属性将 、 和 属性设置为基于单个值的初始值。The property sets the , , and properties to initial values based on a single value. 每次设置此属性时，属性将 设置为属性值的10倍 。Every time the property is set, the property is set to 10 times the property value. 设置属性后，可以单独设置 属性，重写默认值。Once the property is set, you can independently set the property, overriding the default value. 弹出窗口延迟的最长时间为5000毫秒。The maximum time you can delay a popup is 5000 milliseconds. 对于更长的持续时间，请使用 方法来控制显示工具提示的确切时刻。For longer durations, use the method to control the exact moment when the ToolTip is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建类的一个实例 ，并将该实例与在其中创建该实例的关联 。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 然后，该代码初始化延迟属性 、 和 。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外，类的实例 将属性设置为，以 `true` 启用显示工具提示文本，而不考虑窗体是否处于活动状态。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to be displayed regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件（和）相关联 。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 此代码示例要求在示例中定义的方法位于 包含 名为的控件和名为的 `button1` 控件， 并且该 `checkBox1,` 方法是从的构造函数中调用的 。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1,` and that the method is called from the constructor of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性，即使的容器 不处于活动状态，也可以显示工具提示窗口。With the property, you can display a ToolTip window even when the container of the is not active. 在无模式窗口应用程序中，可以使用此功能来启用工具提示窗口，而不管哪个无模式窗口处于活动状态。You can use this feature in a modeless window application to enable ToolTip windows to be displayed regardless of which modeless window is active. 如果要使用创建控件 （其中包含多个显示工具提示窗口的控件），此功能也很有用。This feature is also useful when you want to create a control by using the , which contains a number of controls within it that display ToolTip windows. 由于在 窗体上通常不是活动窗口，因此设置此属性将 `true` 使中的控件可以随时 显示工具提示窗口。Because the is often not the active window on a form, setting this property to `true` enables the controls within the to display ToolTip windows at any time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建类的一个实例 ，并将该实例与在其中创建该实例的关联 。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 然后，该代码初始化延迟属性 、 和 。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外，类的实例 将属性设置为，以 `true` 启用显示工具提示文本，而不考虑窗体是否处于活动状态。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to be displayed regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件（和）相关联 。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 此代码示例要求在示例中定义的方法位于 包含 名为的控件 `button1` 和 名为的控件 `checkBox1` ，并且该方法是从的构造函数中调用的 。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1`, and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类有一个内部计时器，它使用它来设置工具提示的显示时间。The class has an internal timer that it uses to set the display duration for ToolTips. 通过属性设置计时器的持续时间 。Set the duration of the timer through the property. 方法停止此内部计时器，导致显示的任何工具提示模式显示，直到 调用方法或最小化、隐藏或关闭父窗体。The method stops this internal timer, causing any displayed ToolTip to be shown modally until the method is called or the parent form is minimized, hidden, or closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序通常使用相同的字符串资源来实现多种目的，例如菜单项和工具提示。An application commonly uses the same string resource for multiple purposes, such as a menu item and a ToolTip. 但是，菜单通常在菜单项字符串中启用快捷键，由 "与" 字符表示。However, menus often enable accelerators, denoted by an ampersand character, in the menu item string. 工具提示不支持此功能，因此默认情况下，& i i i i i i i i i x 普通字符。ToolTips do not support this capability, so by default, ampersands are just displayed as normal characters. 将 属性设置为可 `true` 从工具提示文本中删除所有的符号。Setting the property to `true` removes all ampersands from the ToolTip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标题在窗口中显示为工具提示控件说明的标准文本之上的一条粗体文本。The title is displayed within the window as a line of bold text above the standard text of a ToolTip control description. 通常情况下，标题仅用于区分窗体上不同类别的控件或作为非常长的控件说明的简介。Typically, titles are only used either to differentiate different categories of controls on a form or as an introduction to a fairly long control description. 标题的最大长度为99个字符。The maximum length of a title is 99 characters. 如果此属性包含一个长度超过99个字符的字符串，则不会显示标题。If this property contains a string longer then 99 characters, no title will be displayed.
